areYouSureDeleteThisItem: Are you sure you wish to delete this item?
passwordChoose: For better protection, consider choosing a passphrase with multiple random words
passwordMinimum: Please use the minimum of 8 characters and can be multiple words with spaces
passwordFile: Oops....cannot import the file. Maybe it was created with a different password? If so, please enter it below or try another file.
passwordsMatch: Password and re-entered password must match
passwordFieldsRequired: All fields are required. New password must be at least 8 characters long
pinLockYourApp: Lock your app with a PIN
pinInstructions: Enter at least a 4 digit PIN number below
pinUseDigits: Please use at least 4 or 6 digits
pinMatch: PIN and re-entered PIN numbers must match
pinTip: Tip: use six or more digits for stronger security
secureDataWith: Secure your data with a password or passphrase
tapAddButtons: Tap the buttons above to add to your wellbeing
track: Track your wellbeing while keeping your data private
signOutClick:
Click below
in order to sign out
signOutWillClear: This will clear your session and will require you to login again
importExplanation: Import your app data from a file
importExplanationLong: Import data from file, maybe after moving to another device or after reset
importBrowseExplanation: Browse for the file where you have stored it during a prior backup/export operation
importPress: Press the button below to import the selected file
fileEmpty: Looks like the file is empty
fileNoValidRecords: No valid records were found in the file
fileInvalidData: Invalid data, please try another file
exportExplanation: Export data to file to be used as a backup or for moving data to another device
exportSubExplanation: Your encrypted data is ready for export
exportNoData: Something went wrong. No data to export.
hideNoteTextSubtitle: Note content will not be revealed by default on home screen
cameraRollPermissionsiOS: Sorry, we need photo gallery permissions to make this work!
cameraRollPermissionsAndroid: Sorry, we need files and media permissions to make this work!
EmptyData: Looks like no records have been found
InvalidFile: Invalid file. If this is a cloud document, please download it to the device first.
InvalidFileData: Invalid data, please try another file
NoRecordsInFile: Looks like there are no records in file
MissingPassword: Missing password or PIN, please try again
InvalidFilePassword: Invalid password for this file, please try again
PasswordAlreadySet: Password has already been set, try logging in instead
MaxLoginAttempts: Lets try entering a password instead
NotEnoughSpace: Not enough storage space to create a file
